amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers in renewal communities to qualify for the renewal community employment credit by employing residents of certain other renewal communities.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 621 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 621 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S6239; text: CR S6239) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers in renewal communities to qualify for the renewal community employment credit by employing residents of certain other renewal communities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 621 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
